code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{storage}from"../firebaseConfig";import{ref,uploadBytes,getDownloadURL}from"firebase/storage";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UploadImage(){const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[url,setUrl]=useState("");const[mensaje,setMensaje]=useState("");const handleFileChange=e=>{if(e.target.files[0]){setFile(e.target.files[0]);}};const handleUpload=async()=>{if(!file){setMensaje("‚ö†Ô∏è Selecciona un archivo primero.");return;}try{const storageRef=ref(storage,"imagenes/".concat(file.name));await uploadBytes(storageRef,file);const downloadURL=await getDownloadURL(storageRef);setUrl(downloadURL);setMensaje("‚úÖ Imagen subida con √©xito.");}catch(error){setMensaje("‚ùå Error al subir: "+error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card p-4 shadow-sm mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-3",children:"Subir Imagen"}),mensaje&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert alert-info",children:mensaje}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",className:"form-control mb-2",onChange:handleFileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleUpload,children:"Subir Imagen"}),url&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uD83D\uDCCE URL de descarga:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:url}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:url,alt:"Subida",className:"img-fluid rounded shadow"})})]})]});}export default UploadImage;
